tahlan.hmd_ForcedOverdrive2: negate the half of the Kassadari Engineering armor reduction
tahlan.hmd_KassEng2: suspended while the ship system is active
tahlan.hmd_KassEng3: inactive while venting flux or when overloaded
tahlan.hmd_Ammo8: Energy damage, deals bonus EMP damage against hull
tahlan.hmd_Ammo17: Splits into a cluster of AoE shells.
tahlan.tyranny2: Increased fleet sizes and ground defenses
tahlan.tyranny5: Effects scale with number of Legio-controlled markets
tahlan.daemonPlatingSmod: When built-in, armor rating penalty is reduced to %s, but regeneration is also reduced to %s per second.
tahlan.hypercoordination_L1_desc: 5%% reduction in supply and fuel usage
tahlan.hypercoordination_L2_desc: 10%% reduction in Deployment Points up to a maximum of 10
tahlan.hmcievetext: When no human officer is assigned to this ship, CIEVE will be assigned command instead.
tahlan.hmcieveunknown: The device is clearly meant for installation on ship command systems, but its actual purpose is unknown.
tahlan.CorruptionLevel1c: +5% damage to larger ships per tier of class difference
tahlan.digitalSoulLevel1a: Allows the piloting of automated ships
tahlan.digitalSoulLevel1b: Reduces automated ship CR penalty for piloted ship to 15%%
tahlan.digitalSoulLevel2a: Fully negates automated ship CR penalty for piloted ship
tahlan.digitalSoulLevel2b: Piloted ship no longer counts for automated ship points calculation
